term.title: hertz

item.text: SI derived unit of frequency equal to one cycle per second, Hz = s-1.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 957. 'Glossary of terms in quantities and units in Clinical Chemistry (IUPAC-IFCC Recommendations 1996)' on page 976 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668040957)
